statements: DELETE FROM experimental_data WHERE id = 1 AND experiment_name = 'First Experiment';
DELETE FROM machine_learning_analysis WHERE timestamp < '2023-01-01' AND accuracy > 0.8;
DELETE FROM ml_analysis WHERE experiment_id = 5 AND analysis_method = 'Logistic Regression';
DELETE FROM subjects WHERE subject_age > 30 AND subject_gender = 'Male';
DELETE FROM machine_learning_results WHERE model_name = 'Random Forest';
DELETE FROM machine_learning_results WHERE experiment_id = 100 AND model_name = 'Regression';
DELETE FROM metadata WHERE researcher_name = 'Alice' AND experiment_date > '2022-01-01';
